scripts.debug:token: bun -e "const t=require('./bmw.tokens.json').id; const payload=t.split('.')[1]; const base=payload.replace(/-/g,'+').replace(/_/g,'/'); const padded=base + '='.repeat((4 - base.length % 4) % 4); const p=JSON.parse(Buffer.from(padded,'base64').toString()); console.log({exp:p.exp, now:Math.floor(Date.now()/1000), dynamic_scopes:p.dynamic_scopes, scp:p.scp, scope:p.scope});"
